STEM which design for kids about age 4-12 years old and help them to delevop their abilities such as Sicence, Technology ,Engineering, Mathematics ! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Glad I purchased this for my son. We build so many things with this set. Tons of fun and you can make so many things. Shipping took a minute but it was worth the wait. So far so good. Hope we continue to make memories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandkids love them
reviews.reviewText: Got as a gift for my grandkids for Christmas! Boy and girl ages 6 and 7 and both love them! They are nice quality and keep them busy! Like building pieces and fidgets put together! You can build cars and other things and the pieces move and pivot. Granddaughter made a “transformer” and also put them all together to “measure” things! Great hands on learning gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for Grandson for Birthday gift. Very sturdy, well made and larger than expected. Nice carry case that comes with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Fun
reviews.reviewText: These provide hours of play for creative minds. A wonderful manipulative set for home or school with the added benefit of a sturdy lidded box with a handle. Younger children will need some assistance snapping pieces together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My children loved this toy but the problem is the yellow parts keep breaking I don't know why it's only the yellow one .. Other colors are greatI like there is 8 wheelsI wish there is more eyes it's only 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Toy But Instructions Could Be Better
reviews.reviewText: Our son has loved these building toys. The case that they come in is super helpful too in keeping everything organized and keep pieces from getting lost.The pieces all feel really durable and are easy to assemble, especially for little hands.My one critique is that the building ideas that come in the instructions are not very clear. My husband and I have had to study them to try to figure out how to build certain things. Obviously, we don’t have to build them just like the pictures, but comparing it to instruction books for other toys, this one lacks a little clarity. It doesn’t keep my son from playing and loving this though, so I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My Grandson was so excited to get these! Love the case they came in and I think he will have many years of fun building with them ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a wonderful addition to my classroom great for all ages.
